    returnPlayersInOrder() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.FlightBoardFacade
    returnPlayersInOrder() utilizes the method returnPlayerInReverseOrder(), which returns a list of player from the last in line to the leader, and reverses it, thereby effectively returning a list of player that contains the leader in the first cell, then the second, and then the third and last player if they are present
    returnPlayersInReverseOrder() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.FlightBoardFacade
    returnPlayersInReverseOrder() utilizes a method provided by the implementation that links every player with an "absolute" value of their progression.
    returnReservedComponents() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.playerset.RocketshipBoard
    returnReservedComponents() simply returns the two reserved components
    returnStartBoard() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.RocketshipBuildingController
    returnStartBoard() is useful to get the board at the start of the game
